author: thorsten
msg: Adding more java documentation and fixing code regarding the output from an Enerjy Code Analysis. Further adding missing license headers.

author: kevan
msg: GERONIMO-3930 The maximum size of each tran log file is 2 gigs (HOWL needs to index using an integer). The default max size will now be 2 megs. The default buffer size was 32k, which is pretty large (typically would have a lot of wasted space). I've bumped it down to 4k.
